name: df-clim
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cc), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cz, wral(s4, cfv(cuz, cv(s3)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
comment: Define the limit relation for complex number sequences. See ~ clim for its relational expression. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.)
